description: The BENEFITS table contains information specific to benefits collection (BEN) record.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the benefit record.

columns.name: ENC_BENEFIT_VRX_ID
columns.description: The verification record for the encounter's benefits.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: The date the record was created.

columns.name: VERIFICATION_DATE
columns.description: The most recent verification date of this BEN record. This will be used to facilitate easier BEN record searching in the future.

columns.name: ORIG_VERIFICATION_DATE
columns.description: The original verification date of the data on this BEN record when it was entered manually or by RTE and verified for the first time.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record's status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted
